function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through close contact among employees and guests","Impact":"Risk of widespread illness, negative customer experience, and business disruption","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and disinfection protocols, promote vaccinations, and create policies for sick leave","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless technology for check-in and payments","People":"Employees, guests, and visitors","Owner":"Hospitality management and HR leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and training on contagious disease prevention","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and employee illness","Mitigation":"Provide regular training on hygiene practices, establish clear protocols for disease prevention, and promote awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Online training platforms, virtual reality simulations for hygiene practices","People":"Employees and management team","Owner":"HR leaders and training departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate measures for handling employee illness and isolation","Impact":"Risk of spreading disease within the workplace, low employee morale, and legal implications","Mitigation":"Create clear protocols for reporting illness, establish isolation areas, and provide support for affected employees","Technologies":"Digital reporting systems for symptoms, remote work technology, telemedicine services","People":"Employees and management team","Owner":"HR leaders and occupational health professionals"}]}
